content.html: When a friend sends you a payment on Monzo you can say thanks with an emoji. And some Northerners sent a certain emoji more than anyone else... #MonzosVeryImportant2021DataThing
content.value:
When a friend sends you a payment on Monzo you can say thanks with an emoji.

And some Northerners sent a certain emoji more than anyone else...

#MonzosVeryImportant2021DataThing

photo.alt: a meme titled "trade offer" that says "i receive: money / you receive: the middle finger emoji"
